ticket.title: Security hardening: multi-holon policy inheritance enforcement + attestation tightening

tickets.reason: Prerequisite per RFC-0019 ticket decomposition ordering

in_scope: Enforce policy inheritance rules across holonic boundaries (subleases are strict subsets)
Rachet attestation requirements by risk tier for receipts (ToolExecutionReceipt, ReviewReceipt, ProjectionReceipt)
Fail closed for missing attestations in high-risk tiers

steps: Read the bound requirement(s) and this ticket scope; confirm no scope creep beyond out_of_scope list.
Implement: Enforce policy inheritance rules across holonic boundaries (subleases are strict subsets)
Implement: Rachet attestation requirements by risk tier for receipts (ToolExecutionReceipt, ReviewReceipt, ProjectionReceipt)
Implement: Fail closed for missing attestations in high-risk tiers
Add/adjust unit/integration tests to cover acceptance criteria and regression risks per RFC-0019/07_test_and_evidence.yaml.
Capture evidence artifacts (logs, receipts, test outputs) and update the corresponding EVID-* artifact with concrete artifact pointers.

criteria: Higher risk tiers require stronger attestations without breaking low-tier throughput
Missing/invalid attestation fails closed where required

notes.security: Productivity-first; keep fail-closed invariants intact where already mandated by RFC-0019.
notes.verification: Prefer deterministic tests and CAS/ledger replay checks; avoid relying on process memory.
notes.general: Keep changes minimal, explicit, and reversible; make dependencies and attribution fields queryable.
